p: The clinical syndrome associated with SARS-CoV-2 comprises a group of clinical features varying in clinical severity from an upper respiratory tract infection to lung infection requiring supplementary oxygen and, in severe cases, intensive care [ 4]. In the Singapore study, SARS-CoV-2 remained detectable for 7 or more days, and the anti-retroviral agent lopinavir/ritonavir was used for treatment without any deaths.
